messages.message: Incompatible alphaSliceByteLength and DFD sampleCount. If DFD indicates an alpha slice the alphaSliceByteLength in BasisLzEtc1sImageDesc must not be 0.
messages.details: For Level 1 Layer 0 Face 0 zSlice 0 the alphaSliceByteLength is 0 but DFD indicates an alpha slice so it must not be 0.
